# Display Tool Handlers

Each of these tools allows a user to adjust the display of an arrangement.

::: handler-title

# Hide Object

::: ::: handler-description Hide selected objects.

::: handler-details

:::

::: handler-title

# Show/Hide Label

::: ::: handler-description Hide or show the label of selected objects. ::: handler-details

:::

::: handler-title

# Move

::: ::: handler-description Move the location of a single object. ::: handler-details

  • This tool moves points, lines, segments, and ellipses that depend on free points.
  • For the purposes of undoing, this tool does not keep track of dependency from the point on one dimensional movements that result from moving one of the above objects. So if you create a line segment with a SEPointOnOneDimensional on it, if you move the line segment and then undo it, the SEPointOnOneDimensional will not necessarily be in the same location as it was ooriginally

:::

::: handler-title

# Rotation

::: ::: handler-description Rotate the current view. ::: handler-details

:::

::: handler-title

# Zoom, Pan, and Standard View

:::

::: handler-description

Pan, Zoom In or Out on the current view or return to the standard view.

::: handler-details

:::
